description: Pumpkin adds subtle sweetness to this silky hummus recipe, delicious with a drizzle of pomegranate molasses on top.
name: Pumpkin & Pomegranate Hummus Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 200Â°C. Add the pumpkin wedges and garlic cloves to a large roasting tin, drizzle over the oil and toss well to coat. Roast for 40 minutes until very tender.

Tip the roasted pumpkin and garlic into a food processor with the chickpeas, tahini, cumin and lemon juice. Blitz until smooth, adding water if necessary. Serve with pomegranate molasses drizzled on top.
